DOC.brief_title: Collection Tissue Blocks Slides From Patients With Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : Cancer type serious disease despite progress make past research , still much poorly understood molecular level . Recent advance biomedical technology platform emerge critical tool accelerate personalized medicine . The collection human tissue specimens invaluable resource conduct translational cancer research use develop technology . The ultimate goal understand molecular indicator cancer development progression . While ideal able study clinical sample , specifically tissue biopsy , however precious often difficult obtain sufficient quantity number conduct proteomic molecular profiling study . There exist , however , vast archive pathologically characterized clinical sample form formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded tissue block . The preservation tissue block and/or slide long-term ( year ) storage important asset aid translational clinical research . This protocol describe procedure receive , label store paraffin-embedded tissue block and/or slide need future analysis . When block ready analysis , requestor follow IRB protocol specific study . OBJECTIVE : - To obtain tissue block slide outside pathology department cancer patient treat Genitourinary Malignancies Branch ( GMB ) Affiliates Center Cancer Research ( CCR ) , National Cancer Institute ( NCI ) order store future study analysis ( e.g. , use molecular technology platform ) . ELIGIBILITY : - Patients suspect , biopsy proof malignant disease evaluate Genitourinary Malignancies Branch ( GMB ) Affiliates Clinics , NCI . DESIGN : - This protocol research study . - Tissue block slide acquire outside pathology department receive Clinical Pharmacology Program OCD/CCR/NCI cod . - Bar-coded tissue block slide transfer Laboratory Pathology/CCR/NCI proper long-term storage .
